sentences.sentence: Biomasses of potato were not different among three treatments of potassium fertilizers.
sentences.translation: 滴施不同钾肥对马铃薯植株生物量的积累差异不显著；

sentences.sentence: The contents of mycelium biomasses and rough polysaccharide on the submerged fermentation of six agaricus blazei strains were studied in this paper.
sentences.translation: 不同菌株深层发酵的生物量和粗多糖含量变异很小。
